title: My character periodically stops responding
body: I am not entirely sure it's packet loss but sometimes during a fight, my champion will path strangely. It also seems like my cursor vanishes.

replies.body:
Champions sliding across the map or if they take awhile to respond to your inputs, there is a pretty good chance it's caused by packet loss. Packet loss is essentially when your connection starts losing bits of data here and there which can cause some really weird reactions in the game.

We can confirm this through our [**Connection Log Reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743). Take your most recent League logs and pop them in there! It'll let you know whether our packet loss suspicions are right or not.
